name: Eggilicious Meatloaf with Sun-dried Tomato Relish
description: An eggy twist on a family classic!

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or French Onion Dip Mix
lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation: Combine all relish ingredients in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for about 15 minutes to thicken and let flavours blend.
For the meatloaf, whisk eggs with milk in a large bowl. Stir in breadcrumbs and Seasoning for Meatballs & Meatloaf. Crumble in beef and season with Sea Salt. Mix well.

Divide meat mixture into 6 equal portions. Place 3 portions on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Shape and flatten each into a small rectangle. Make a dip in each and place 1 hard-cooked egg in centre. Cover each with remaining meat portions and press edges together to form mini loaves.
Bake in centre of oven 30–35 minutes, until an instant-read thermometer registers an internal temperature of 160° F (71° C). Let stand 5 minutes, then slice.

products.name: Sun-Kissed Tomato Dip Mix
summary: Cut your grocery bill costs and make a better-for-you tomato dip at home!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: A savory medley of robust onion and herbs. Made with 3 different types of onions: chives, onion, and scallions.

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: A savory medley with roasted onion & notes of parsley.

products.name: Classic Meatloaf Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Traditional home-style meatloaf. Deeply rich beef flavour, dressed up with a tangy, sweet sauce.

products.name: Sea Salt (Grinder)
summary: Crisp, clean salt from the sea.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Multipurpose Pot - 8 Cup
summary: An 8 cup, multi-use, stainless-steel cooking pot with a lid made of glass, steel & silicone rubber.
